screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ndtx file in Nevron Software MyDraw 5
screenshot.caption: NDTX file open in Nevron Software MyDraw 5

description: NDTX files are similar to MyDraw XML .NDX drawings, but they store drawings from which other drawings can be generated to replicate similar layout and/or content. Examples of drawings NDTX templates may contain include flowcharts, organizational charts, mind maps, family trees, and data flow processes.

You can create an NDTX file with MyDraw by selecting File â†’ Save As... , then choose the "MyDraw XML Drawing Template" format. If you want to save the drawing in a different format, choose one of the other available formats, including "MyDraw Binary Drawing" and"MyDraw XML Drawing."
